pages.text: Sbuccuaen Oebbi, kra illan deg igenwan, u kra illan di tmurt. Agellid, Ssid, Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
D Neppa id Iuznen i wid ur ne$oi, Amazan segsen, iqqao asen issekniyen iS. Izizdig iten, isselmad asen Tazmamt akked uuwab, xas llan, zik, di ttelfan n uuee
U i wid nniven, mara awven $uosen. Neppa, d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
D wagi ay d lfevl n Oebbi. Ippak it i win Ib$a. Oebbi, d bab n lfevl ameqwoahan
Am wid iwumi ippukelfen s Tuoa, ur p ssawven. Cuban a$yul ibubben tizmamin. I icmet umedya n ugdud inekoen issekniyen n Oebbi! Oebbi ur Inehhu ara agdud imednas
Ini: "a yudayen, ma t$ilem d kunwi ay d iebiben n Oebbi, war imdanen, ssutret tameppant, ma tessawalem tidep
Ur p ssuturen ara, d awez$i, ilmend igiten nnsen. Oebbi Issen imednas
Ini: "tameppant iwumi tregwlem, a kwen id temmager, war ccekk. Sinna, a kwen awin ar Win Ieoan ayen iffren akked wayen ur neffir. Ad awen Imel ayen txeddmem
